page.title: 06LOCAL SERVICES IN MIDMAR
page.content: In Midmar there are not many 'fixed' shops.There is only a nearby post- office, although there used to be several others.There is no newspaper delivery to houses, but the shop stocks them.Because there are not many 'fixed' shops, there are plenty travelling shops.We have a baker, a butcher, a fishmonger, an ale van and a library.We have the post delivered to our houses, and a refuse collection takes place every Tuesday.A milkman comes round on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays.We have no bus within the area , so we go to school in a privately owned mini bus.There are no permanent medical centres or doctors surgeries in the area either, but there is a nurse who visits sick people.Many houses still have a separate well water supply,and septic tanks and cesspits are still in wide use.
